title: Welp, it's time for me to find alternatives to all my Google products
body:
If any of you saw the project v video uploaded yesterday, it has already been removed from youtube for "privacy claims".

Google is literally going full Orwell and has taken it on themselves to be responsible for manipulating their users into thinking what they think. Scary shit.

P.S. Try googling "men can" and see what it autocompletes your search results to. "Something something let's make the world more fair" - Google.
